Annual Report Posters

At the beginning of 2009, inspired by designer Nicholas Felton's Annual Reports, I started recording various details in an attempt to create my own infographic poster documenting the various minutia of the year. In the following years, it was become a yearly tradition and way for me to look back over the past year. Each year takes the format of an 11x17 two-color poster set in two typefaces. The 2009 poster was featured in a lecture Mr. Felton gave at the 2010 see Conference.

  • Data Visualization
